content: वाक्यं [वच्-ण्यत् चस्य कः] {@--1@} Speech, words, a sentence, saying, what is spoken; शृणु मे वाक्यं ‘here my words’, ‘hear me’; वाक्ये न संतिष्ठते ‘does not obey’; <ls>Śi. 2. 24.</ls> {@--2@} A sentence, period (complete utterance of a thought); वाक्यं स्याद्योग्यताकांक्षासत्तियुक्तः पदोच्चयः <ls>S. D. 6</ls>; पदसमूहो वाक्यं <ls>Tarka K.</ls>; श्रौत्यार्थी च भवेद्वाक्ये समासे तद्धिते तथा <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> {@--3@} An argument or syllogism (in logic). {@--4@} A precept, rule, an aphorism. {@--5@} (In <ab>astr.</ab>) The solar process for all astronomical computations.
